Key Match Events: Jalen Suggs left the game in the second quarter with back spasms.
Orlando Magic was leading 56-41 when Suggs got injured.
Cole Anthony started the second half in place of Suggs.
Post-Match Reflections: Magic coach Jamahl Mosley commented on Suggs' injury, noting that it appeared to be back spasms and that Suggs would be re-evaluated.
Tristan da Silva and Cory Joseph mentioned their support for Suggs and the team's 'next man up' mentality.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Orlando Magic is currently dealing with multiple injuries, including Paolo Banchero and Franz Wagner with torn obliques, Moe Wagner with an ACL tear, Anthony Black with a low back contusion, and Gary Harris with a re-aggravated left hamstring strain.
